Projects

  • Capstone project at Brown (spring 2016)

    My undergraduate capstone project at Brown was on verifying the solutions to several epistemic logic puzzles in the Alloy programming language. The abstract is here. You can also download the Alloy files and run them yourself; they are here.

  • Model theory (spring 2015)

    With a group of 8 other students, I ran a group independent study project (GISP) course on Model Theory, in spring 2016. The website for that course can be found here.

    Here are some of the notes I wrote for that course:

    • Notes on natural deduction

    • Notes on filters and ultrafilters

    • Notes on ultrapowers

    (The notes are mostly, but not entirely, free of errors.)

Caleb Stanford, 2016.
